creditline: Gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
dimension: 29 x 20 in. (73.66 x 50.8 cm) (sheet, as printed)
text:
This artwork is part of the series COVID-19: Labor Camp Report.   

Artist's statement on this artwork originally published on the @laborcamp Instagram account: 

The death of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg made it clear how loss of just one life can affect millions. We have now lost more than 200,000 lives to the pandemic, and thousands continue to die each week. I have said it before, but it is important to remember: it didn’t have to be this way. Vote the criminal Regime out.
title: September 20, 2020: 200,000 GONE
